title: 1981 Coupe de France Final
text: The Coupe de France Final 1981 was a <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> match held at <a href="Parc%20des%20Princes">Parc des Princes</a>, <a href="Paris">Paris</a> on 13 June 1981, that saw <a href="SC%20Bastia">Bastia</a> defeat <a href="AS%20Saint-%C3%89tienne">Saint-Étienne</a> 2–1 thanks to goals by <a href="Louis%20Marcialis">Louis Marcialis</a> and <a href="Roger%20Milla">Roger Milla</a>.
